input.sentences: [male] and [male] are on the set of a movie .
their friends [female] and [male] are there with them .
[male] looks really focused for the movie .
the filming has started and they are interviewing [male]
[male] is proud to be on camera to tell his story .
output.sentences: The males on the movie set were reading their lines.
It was a movie about males being friends with females.
The male in the movie had to stay focused.
During a break from set he started a quick interview.
He talked about what a great story the movie portrayed and that he was very proud to take part  in the production.
